synopsis:
Bartolomeo and Otama look back on Luffy and the Straw Hat Crew's adventures in the Land of Wano. Otama tells Bartolomeo about her meeting with Luffy, and the events leading up to the fierce battle with Kaido.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: One Piece Special Episode: Barto's Secret Room
title.jp: One Piece: Luffy Senpai Ouen Kikaku! Barto no Himitsu no Heya!
